bibl.title: Premarital Cohabitation in Ancient Judea: The Evidence of the Babatha Archive and the Mishnah (Ketubbot 1.4).
bibl.note: P. Yadin I, 37, marriage contract of Salome Komais, should be taken to mean exactly what it claims. Some men and women in Jewish society of second-century Palestine did live together out of wedlock.
bibl.seg: ILAN Tal, Premarital Cohabitation in Ancient Judea: The Evidence of the Babatha Archive and the Mishnah (Ketubbot 1.4).
